The only thing that works for me is to disable protect from DPI

From: zloyden ***@***.***>
Sent: Thursday, 6 April 2023 4:39 PM
To: AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters ***@***.***>
Cc: Anthony ***@***.***>; Mention ***@***.***>

Strange, but I don't see any problem with that option.
Could you open the site with this rule in User rules?

@@||portfolioonline.com.au^$stealth

AdGuard for Android

4 0

Missed ads or ad leftovers, Missed analytics or tracker

Microsoft Edge

Mobile

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.squareup.cash

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Social Media filter, AdGuard Annoyances filter, AdGuard Cookie Notices filter, AdGuard Popups filter, AdGuard Mobile App Banners filter, AdGuard Widgets filter, AdGuard Other Annoyances filter, AdGuard DNS filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

uxh52u-dlsdk.appsflyersdk.com

We can add dlsdk.appsflyersdk.com without the || or -

### Privacy

issue.title: Amazon ads leftover in Voice Record Pro app
issue.body:
### Prerequisites - [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml); - [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue; - [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date; - [X] Browser version is up-to-date; - [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue. ### What product do you use? AdGuard DNS ### AdGuard version not sure ### What type of problem have you encountered? Missed ads or ad leftovers ### Which browser(s) do you use? the problem is with app, not a site ### Which device do you use? Mobile ### Where is the problem encountered? https://apps.apple.com/app/id546983235 ### What filters do you have enabled? AdGuard DNS filter ### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled? _No response_ ### Add your comment and screenshots 1. The app Voice Record Pro has leftover Amazon ads at the bottom. The ad disappears after a while and never returns back, until you close and reload the app. 2. The offending ad url is bjads.bejbej.ca. I request you to add this url to your DNS service filter 3. I’m using Adguard free DNS service, which only uses base DNS filter 4. Screenshots
Screenshot 1:
### Privacy - [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/147497#issuecomment-1500421966 -  It's related to this - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardBrowserExtension/issues/1486 and it's caused by `Web Annoyances Ultralist`.
So please add this rule:
```adblock
youtube.com#@$##contentContainer.tp-yt-app-drawer[swipe-open].tp-yt-app-drawer::after, tp-yt-app-drawer { position: absolute !important; }
```
to user rules or disable `Help with the development of AdGuard filters` in AdGuard's settings or disable `Web Annoyances Ultralist`.

<hr>

I cannot reproduce ads.
